My Story

BIO

I grew up in a small town in Kazakhstan before studying languages in Siberia where I majored in English. Six year old me would never have dreamed of becoming a professional Web Developer, however, my love for languages and technology together with my adventurous spirit brought me to where I am today. I am a Flatiron Software Engineering graduate based in New York City with a background in hospitality. I am passionate about learning UX/UI design, human psychology and behavior and I am committed to using technology to make the world a better place. I believe in being humble and relentlessly chasing your dreams.
